alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:05AM MST until December 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches in the valleys with 2 to 5 inches in the mountains. An additional 5 to 8 inches are expected in the Elkhorns and southern Wallowas. Valleys in Baker county could see light ice accumulation from freezing rain Sunday morning. * WHERE...In Idaho, Upper Weiser River zone. In Oregon, Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
